subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Organizers say Phil Mickelson is confirmed as an entrant for next month’s P.G.A. Championship at Hazeltine in Minnesota, the fourth and final major of the season.
snippet: Organizers say Phil Mickelson is confirmed as an entrant for next month’s P.G.A. Championship at Hazeltine in Minnesota, the fourth and final major of the season.
